title: Your Shop is Still Bad
body: I did not see my shop before it was disabled to make sure that players got sales for champs that play but after the "fix" only 1 of my 5 most played champions recenlty have a sale, 4 of the sales are from champs that I have not played recently and one is a champ that I have played once.

replies.body: I have the same problem. Lots of badness and no decent deals either. There's all of 1 skin I'd want to buy and it's straight up worse than another skin I have for that champ. I really enjoy the Your Shop deal but I feel like (bugs aside) this one dropped the ball.
